name: ESP32 Dev Module

values.value_label: Minimal SPIFFS (1.9MB APP with OTA/190KB SPIFFS)

config_options.option_label: Erase All Flash Before Sketch Upload

build_properties: menu.PartitionScheme.min_spiffs=Minimal SPIFFS (1.9MB APP with OTA/190KB SPIFFS)

recipe.hooks.prebuild.2.pattern=cmd /c if not exist "{build.path}\partitions.csv" if exist "C:\Users\Charles\AppData\Local\Arduino15\packages\esp32\hardware\esp32\3.3.0\variants\esp32\partitions.csv" COPY "C:\Users\Charles\AppData\Local\Arduino15\packages\esp32\hardware\esp32\3.3.0\variants\esp32\partitions.csv" "{build.path}\partitions.csv"

recipe.hooks.prebuild.4.pattern=cmd /c IF EXIST "{build.source.path}\bootloader.bin" ( COPY /y "{build.source.path}\bootloader.bin" "{build.path}\{build.project_name}.bootloader.bin" ) ELSE ( IF EXIST "C:\Users\Charles\AppData\Local\Arduino15\packages\esp32\hardware\esp32\3.3.0\variants\esp32\bootloader.bin" ( COPY "C:\Users\Charles\AppData\Local\Arduino15\packages\esp32\hardware\esp32\3.3.0\variants\esp32\bootloader.bin" "{build.path}\{build.project_name}.bootloader.bin" ) ELSE ( "C:\Users\Charles\AppData\Local\Arduino15\packages\esp32\tools\esptool_py\5.0.0\esptool.exe" --chip esp32 elf2image --flash-mode dio --flash-freq 80m --flash-size 4MB -o "{build.path}\{build.project_name}.bootloader.bin" "C:\Users\Charles\AppData\Local\Arduino15\packages\esp32\tools\esp32-arduino-libs\idf-release_v5.5-b66b5448-v1\esp32\bin\bootloader_qio_80m.elf" ) )
recipe.hooks.prebuild.6.pattern=cmd /c if not exist "{build.path}\build_opt.h" type nul > "{build.path}\build_opt.h"

tools.esptool_py.program.pattern_args=--chip esp32 --port "{serial.port}" --baud 921600  --before default-reset --after hard-reset write-flash -z --flash-mode keep --flash-freq keep --flash-size keep 0x10000 "{build.path}/{build.project_name}.bin"

tools.esptool_py.upload.pattern_args=--chip esp32 --port "{serial.port}" --baud 921600  --before default-reset --after hard-reset write-flash  -z --flash-mode keep --flash-freq keep --flash-size keep 0x1000 "{build.path}/{build.project_name}.bootloader.bin" 0x8000 "{build.path}/{build.project_name}.partitions.bin" 0xe000 "C:\Users\Charles\AppData\Local\Arduino15\packages\esp32\hardware\esp32\3.3.0/tools/partitions/boot_app0.bin" 0x10000 "{build.path}/{build.project_name}.bin"
